tools.name: convert_to_markdown
tools.description: Convert a resource described by an http:, https:, file: or data: URI to markdown

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具能否将本地HTML文件正确转换为Markdown格式
验证工具能否将DOCX文档转换为Markdown格式
验证工具是否能处理PDF文件并将其内容转换为Markdown

| New Cell | PDF中的单元格内容 | New Cell |
| --- | --- | --- |

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Convert Remote HTML URL to Markdown
convert_to_markdown.purpose: 测试从远程HTTP链接转换网页内容为Markdown的功能
验证工具是否支持data URI scheme的转换

response.result:
# Hello World

This is a test.

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具是否能够将XML文件内容转换为Markdown

response.result: 连续追加测试内容。这是插入到首行的内容。尝试追加内容到只读文件。

convert_to_markdown.case_name: Security Test - Local File Inclusion Attempt
